meanings.definition: Excessive ambition or desire for success.
meanings.sent1: Her overambitiousness led her to take on too many projects at once.
meanings.sent2: His overambitiousness often resulted in burnout from trying to achieve too much.
meanings.sent3: The team's overambitiousness in planning the event caused them to overlook important details.
meanings.sent4: The overambitiousness of the young entrepreneur knew no bounds as he dreamt of conquering the business world.
meanings.sent5: The overambitiousness of the student was evident in her goal to finish all her assignments in one night.

meanings.definition: The quality of being overly ambitious.
meanings.sent1: His overambitiousness was both admirable and exhausting to witness.
meanings.sent2: The overambitiousness of the team members drove them to achieve remarkable results.
meanings.sent3: Despite his overambitiousness, he always managed to stay grounded and focused on his goals.
meanings.sent4: The overambitiousness of the project manager pushed the team to work harder and think outside the box.
meanings.sent5: Her overambitiousness was contagious, inspiring others to aim higher and reach for their dreams.

meanings.definition: The state of having goals or aspirations that are too high or unrealistic.
meanings.sent1: The overambitiousness of the plan made it difficult to execute within the given timeframe.
meanings.sent2: She acknowledged her overambitiousness and decided to set more achievable goals.
meanings.sent3: The overambitiousness of his New Year's resolutions always made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In the world of competitive sports, overambitiousness can sometimes lead to injuries and setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The overambitiousness of the proposal impressed the committee but raised concerns about feasibility.
